meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a substance or material.
meanings.sent1: The artist used clayzas to create unique sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced many plasticzas for packaging.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled glitterzas all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered like silkzas under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The potion was made with magical dustzas for extra potency.
